https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fJca6hwiTuHe79LSQ8dWLHXm2Pm.jpg A grief-struck life insurance salesman rails at God for not stepping in to save his bride; but the tables are turned when a mysterious book is delivered to him, an ancient volume listing names and death dates, dates which are yet to occur. Book of Days
